secret_rule: Only items that can be broken down into two English words, without rearranging the letters, can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "hot dog" and "ice cream".

okay, based on the examples provided by the game master, "hot dog" and "ice cream", i will make my best guess about the secret rule.

my guess is that the rule is:

the secret rule is that the items must be a combination of a food item and a flavor or type of that food item.

in the examples provided, "hot dog" is a food item (hot dog) combined with a type/flavor of that food item (hot).
and "ice cream" is a food item (ice cream) combined with a flavor of that food item (ice).

therefore, my final guess for the secret rule is that the items must be a combination of a food item and a flavor or type of that food item.
